INTRO: ^I checked the mail, excited for the day's packages. What fun news awaited me today?
^I stared in horror at the letter addressed to me from Whiskerton county court. Something I've never seen before in all my nine lives.
^Wow!! I've always wanted to try going to court!
^THIS IS THE WORST DAY OF MY NINE LIVES
OPTIMISTIC: ^Woohoo!!!! Let's go mete out justice baby!!!!
